method: Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add tofu cubes and cook until lightly browned on all sides.
Remove tofu from the skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, add the mixed vegetables, soy sauce, capers, sesame oil, minced garlic, and minced ginger.
In a small bowl, whisk together the cornstarch and water to make a slurry.
Pour the slurry into the skillet and stir until the sauce thickens.
Add the tofu back to the skillet and stir to coat in the sauce.
Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, until heated through.
Serve the stir-fry over steamed rice or noodles.
